title: Easter dinner ain't happening... Now what?
itunes:title: Easter dinner ain't happening... Now what?
description:
We had an amazing post in our membership Facebook group this week.
 
One of our members posted about how her family is not getting together for Easter dinner. She talked about how she is beginning to realize that the holiday is not about the food...it's about her family.
 
In today's podcast we talk about how true this is, how now is the time it becomes so important to connect with our loved ones in a way that's healthy and meaningful.
 
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse
